channel.title: 語言 on 術
channel.description: Recent content in 語言 on 術

item.title: Narcos
item.description: I just watched 3 seasons of netflix’s series Narcos, really enjoyed the south american landscape scene and latino guitar. The script is about 70% Español and 30% English. kingpin - キングピン S3E1 The Kingpin Strategy a person or thing that is essential to the success of an organization or operation. smuggler synonyms: - trafficker - mule paranoid characterized by suspiciousness, persecutory trends, or megalomania behaving in a paranoid manner with accusations of persecutions
